activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11290
activity.text:
I will fix the search issue for 'India' in the country selection dropdown to ensure it works as expected. My approach includes:

Investigating the Root Cause:
Checking how the search is implemented (e.g., case sensitivity, sorting order, filtering logic).
Identifying whether the issue is due to API response, frontend filtering, or database ordering.
Implementing Fixes:
Ensuring 'India' appears at the top when searched.
Improving search logic to handle special cases.
Checking for inconsistent data formats or ranking issues in search results.
Testing:
Verifying that 'India' appears correctly in the search results.
Ensuring no unintended side effects on other country searches.
Expected Timeline:

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11380
activity.text:
I will add a Back icon to the Back button to improve usability and visual clarity. My approach includes:

Identifying Button Implementation: Checking if the button is using a standard HTML <button>, a UI framework (e.g., Material-UI, Bootstrap), or a custom component.
Adding Back Icon:
Using an appropriate icon library (e.g., FontAwesome, Material Icons) or an SVG for consistency.
Placing the icon before the text label for better UX.
Ensuring proper alignment and spacing with CSS.
Testing:
Verifying that the icon appears correctly on different screen sizes.
Ensuring that adding the icon does not break existing button functionality.
Expected Timeline:
ðŸ“… End date: 1 day

Additional Context:

I will follow the project's existing UI/UX patterns for consistency.
Open to suggestions on icon style (e.g., arrow, chevron, or standard back icon).
Looking forward to your approval! ðŸš€

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11406
activity.text:
I will remove the tooltips on the 'See Details' and 'Expand All' buttons to ensure they do not appear on hover. My approach includes:

Identifying Tooltip Implementation: Checking if tooltips are added via HTML attributes (title), a UI library, or custom JavaScript.
Removing Tooltips:
If using title, I will remove it from the button elements.
If using a UI library (e.g., Material-UI, Bootstrap), I will update the component configuration.
If added via JavaScript, I will modify the logic to prevent tooltip rendering.
Testing: Verifying that tooltips no longer appear while ensuring button functionality remains intact.
Expected Timeline:
ðŸ“… End date: 3 days

Additional Context:

I will ensure consistency with the project's design guidelines.
Open to feedback and alternative approaches if required.
Looking forward to your approval! ðŸš€

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11259
activity.text:
I will fix the text overflow issue in the Coverage Card by ensuring long Payor IDs wrap correctly and remain readable. My approach includes:

CSS Fix: Implementing word-wrap: break-word; or overflow-wrap: break-word; to prevent text overflow.
Responsive Styling: Adjusting max-width, white-space, and text-overflow properties for better text handling.
Testing: Ensuring the fix works across different screen sizes and browsers without breaking UI consistency.

ðŸ“… End date: [Mention your expected completion date]

Additional Context:

I will verify the fix on multiple test cases with varying Payor ID lengths.
Open to feedback and adjustments to align with project design guidelines.

activity.text:

UI Improvements: Refining card layout, spacing, and typography for better readability.
Responsive Design: Ensuring cards adjust well across different screen sizes using CSS Grid/Flexbox.
Interactivity Enhancements: Adding hover effects, better alignment, and potential tooltips for key information.
Performance Optimization: Ensuring minimal re-renders and efficient DOM updates to keep UI smooth.
